name: Supernova: Fruit Machine Simulator
overview: Written in AMOS. Game design by Helen Collender. Coding by Philip Collender. Graphics by Darren Collender. Includes a built-in reel editor, which allows players to swap & change any of the fruits on the 4 reels and save them to disk to play in the game itself. Probably the only true Fruit Machine simulator with a built in Reel Editor. Includes 4 Reels/Nudges/Numbers/Money Pot/Super Win/Stop 'A" Win/Double or Lose/Holds.
